sentences.en: a job in which a variety of professional skills will be deployed
sentences.cn: 要用到多项专业技术的工作

sentences.en: Align with centre team's strategy, to deploy the new platform in region.
sentences.cn: 从总部接手新的软件平台, 安装并配置在本区域.

sentences.en: At 11 o'clock each morning thousands of freshmen and sophomores used to deploy over the campus.
sentences.cn: 每天早上十一点钟,数以千计的一、二年级学生在校园里各就各位.

sentences.en: Company B Commander Deploy the 3 rd Platoon. Have them attack the flank.
sentences.cn: 第三小队散开. 敌人从侧面攻击过来了.

sentences.en: Deploy Emissary near your Expansion Field and wait for it to deploy.
sentences.cn: 将勘探车放在你的分矿区并且等待他部署.

sentences.en: Deploy priests and other agents to deal with heretics.
sentences.cn: 部属牧师和其他专职人员去对付异教徒.

sentences.en: How do delphi developer deploy solution write in delphi using interbase.
sentences.cn: Delphi开发者如何用InterBase发布其用Delphi写的解决方案.

sentences.en: Now that you have seen the anatomy of each component, you can deploy them.
sentences.cn: 您已经了解了对每个组件的剖析，现在可以部署它们了。

sentences.en: Obama would deploy soft power the power attract rather than coerce.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马将运用“巧实力外交”的拉拢性力量取代强制性力量.

sentences.en: Researchers are now trying to deploy this strategy against several infectious agents.
sentences.cn: 研究人员现下正努力预防几传染体部署这个策略.

sentences.en: Snake : And deploy them all over the Soviet Union?
sentences.cn: 要在苏联全境部署它们 吗 ?

sentences.en: So far, however, we have said nothing about how to deploy it.
sentences.cn: 到现在，我们还没说任何如何部署的内容。

sentences.en: The general ordered his men to deploy in order to meet the offensive of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 将军命令他的士兵展开阵形,以抗击敌人的进攻.

sentences.en: The infantry began to deploy at dawn.
sentences.cn: 步兵黎明时开始进入战斗位置.

sentences.en: The president said he had no intention of deploying ground troops.
sentences.cn: 总统说他无意调遣地面部队。

sentences.en: They are also easy to deploy, because no airfield is needed.
sentences.cn: 此外,它们无需飞机场,容易部署.

sentences.en: To see if wildlife is recovering , they deploy autocameras in the forests.
sentences.cn: 为了发现野生动物的踪迹, 科学家在森林里布置了自动相机.

sentences.en: We must deploy our forces correctly to win the battle.
sentences.cn: 为了赢得这场战斗,我们必须正确地部署我们的部队.

sentences.en: You can then customize and deploy these artifacts in the usual way.
sentences.cn: 然后，您可以以常规的方式定制和部署这些工件。

sentences.en: You can � � t deploy the fleet to ppl who are in vacation - mode.
sentences.cn: 你不行派遣舰队到状态属于假期模式的人那里.

trans.tran_en: to organize or move soldiers, military equipment etc so that they are in the right place and ready to be used

trans.tran_cn: 部署； 使用， 运用
trans.tran_en: to organize or move soldiers, military equipment etc so that they are in the right place and ready to be used
